Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: Anthony P. Oliva
Reviews.Content: The camera is perfect for my needs. it is well made and has the appearance of a genuine security. The price was excellent and delivery was as promised.

Reviews.Title: excellente product!!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Hernandez "Richard Herndz"
Reviews.Content: 100 % trustfull, then I will buy some ones because it is an excellent option to secure many places of the burglars

Reviews.Title: Blinking red led looks ridiculous
Reviews.Author: caravantes
Reviews.Content: The camera is small and cheaply made, which are forgivable sins because of the bargin price. However, once I found out that the red led when activated blinks on and off, which no real security camera would do when recording. It makes it look unconvincing and cheap. So if you are looking for a realistic deterrent this is not the camera to get.Suggestion to manufacturer make one that does not blink, advertise it as such and you will sell many more.

ProductInfo.Features:
19 Faux Clear LED Lights
Motion-Detecting Sensor, Red Light Comes on When Sensor is Activated
Unit Appears to Function as an Actual Security Camera
No Wiring Needed, Requires 2 AAA Batteries (not included)
Measures 2-1/4" x 5-3/4" x 2-3/4"
ProductInfo.Name: Mitaki-Japan® Mock Wireless Security Camera
